column4: I'm trying to burn the 8.04 cd using the built-in CD burner (whatever is installed by default) in Ubuntu 7.10. I have now made 4 coasters in a row. WTF??? Am I missing something? The software seems to have zero options to tweak, other than recording speed and I've tried everything from 16x down to 2x with the same result. What should I be using?
don't make data CDs, you have to make iso images
Right click the iso file, and write to disc
I have just been right-clicking the iso and choosing "write to disc"
